name: Morgen Tasks
description: Manage your Morgen tasks directly from Ulauncher - list, search, and create tasks

preferences.name: Morgen Tasks
preferences.description: Keyword to trigger Morgen Tasks extension

preferences.name: Morgen Tasks (New Task Shortcut)
preferences.description: Optional shortcut keyword to create a new task (acts like typing: mg new ...). Leave empty to disable.

preferences.name: Morgen API Key
preferences.description: Your Morgen API key from platform.morgen.so (stored unencrypted by Ulauncher in ~/.config/ulauncher/ext_preferences/ulauncher-morgen-tasks.db)

preferences.name: Cache Duration (seconds)
preferences.description: How long to cache task list (default: 600 seconds / 10 minutes)

preferences.name: Manual List Map 1 - Name
preferences.description: Optional manual label for a list ID mapping (slot 1).

preferences.name: Manual List Map 1 - List ID
preferences.description: Full taskListId value to map to slot 1 name.

preferences.name: Manual List Map 2 - Name
preferences.description: Optional manual label for a list ID mapping (slot 2).

preferences.name: Manual List Map 2 - List ID
preferences.description: Full taskListId value to map to slot 2 name.

preferences.name: Manual List Map 3 - Name
preferences.description: Optional manual label for a list ID mapping (slot 3).

preferences.name: Manual List Map 3 - List ID
preferences.description: Full taskListId value to map to slot 3 name.

preferences.name: Manual List Map 4 - Name
preferences.description: Optional manual label for a list ID mapping (slot 4).

preferences.name: Manual List Map 4 - List ID
preferences.description: Full taskListId value to map to slot 4 name.

preferences.name: Manual List Map 5 - Name
preferences.description: Optional manual label for a list ID mapping (slot 5).

preferences.name: Manual List Map 5 - List ID
preferences.description: Full taskListId value to map to slot 5 name.

preferences.name: Dev Tools Enabled (1/0)
preferences.description: Show developer commands (1 = enabled, 0 = hidden). Default: 1.
